rules_text: At the beginning of combat on your turn, you may tap an untapped sentai you control. If you tap one or more creatures this way, create a Mech token and put two +1/+1 counters on it for each creature in that sentai. [i](A Mech is a 3/3 Vehicle artifact with crew 2. A sentai is up to one creature of each colour.)[/i]
